text: Farid Afganovich Yadullaev (russian: Фарид Афганович Ядуллаев; born 15 November 1997; Russia, Saratov) is a Russian professional MMA fighter, Master of Sports of Russia, champion of Russia in kickboxing, 3-time winner of the championship, karateka (black belt), boxer with the CCM category and participant in various international tournaments. We recognize in POP-MMA under the pseudonym "FARA" (Russian FARA). == Biography == Farid was born on November 15, 1997 in the Russian city of Saratov. == References == Category:Living people
title: Farid Yadullaev
